intro: Parsonsia celebica, commonly known as the Celebes flame tree, is a tropical flowering plant native to Indonesia. It belongs to the Apocynaceae family and is characterized by its striking orange-red flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has smooth, greyish bark and long, narrow leaves that are opposite in arrangement. Its flowers are not only visually appealing but also attract various pollinators such as birds and insects. Parsonsia celebica is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
